title: President Donald J. Trump Signs H.R. 1397 and H.R. 1719 into Law – The White House
content:
Statements & Releases			

		Land & Agriculture	

Issued on:
June 22, 2018
On Friday, June 22, 2018, the President signed into law:H.R. 1397, which directs the transfer of administrative jurisdiction of certain Federal land along the George Washington Memorial Parkway, in Fairfax County, Virginia; andH.R. 1719, the “John Muir National Historic Site Expansion Act,” which authorizes the National Park Service to acquire by donation approximately 44 acres of land in Martinez, California, for inclusion in the John Muir National Historic Site.
